attributes.action: Lower the provision of free TV licences from 75years to 70years of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Senior Citizens rely on television and radio more and more, rather than engage in evening activities outside there home. The increasing cost of TV licences adds greatly to the financial burden they have to carry. Rises in pensions (derisory), does not keep pace with increases in council tax and utility bills, nor increases in tv licences. this makes paying for an increased tv licence a distinct hardship.
